CustomField.description: Displays four colored circles where color is indicative of persisting cases with differing impacts
CustomField.formula:
IF( Yellow_Case_Record_Count__c > 0 , IMAGE("/resource/YellowCase","",20,20) + ' ',IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20)+ ' ')&
IF( Red_Case_Record_Count__c > 0 , IMAGE("/resource/RedCase","",20,20) + ' ', IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20))&
IF( Orange_Case_Record_Count__c > 0 , IMAGE("/resource/OrangeCase","",20,20) + ' ',IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20)+ ' ')&
IF( Blue_Case_Record_Count__c > 0, IMAGE("/resource/BlueCase","",20,20) + ' ',IMAGE("/resource/WhiteCase","",20,20)+ ' ')
CustomField.label: Case Status
